services.intro: ID Holding International offers specialized transport services to meet the needs of the mining industry, international trade and the oil sector. Founded in 2025, our company began its activities in January 2026 with container transport, then in February 2026 with mining products transport. We offer logistics solutions adapted to your specific needs. Our expertise covers the transport of mining products (bauxite, manganese, gold, iron), maritime container transport from ports to your warehouses, and secure transport of fuels and petroleum products. We are committed to respecting deadlines, guaranteeing the safety of your goods and providing you with quality service. Our qualified teams and vehicles equipped with GPS systems ensure real-time tracking and complete traceability of your shipments.

fleet.intro: ID Holding has a modern and diverse fleet to meet all your transport needs.
